for your own good, change Windows file explorer preferences to not to hide known filename extension
those you get from http://ubuntu.com/desktop/get-ubuntu/download  are ISO   (disc image)

but winrar could only extract ISO,  not burning to disc
you don't have to redownload.... it is just WinRar registers itself as the default application to handle ISO
seriously, set not to hide file name extension in explorer,  it helps
